item.title: Network
item.description: Layers Layer Name Function Devices OSI Layer 4 Application HTTP, FTP, SMB, SMTP, DHCP etc. AWS ALB L5-7 3 Transport packets, TCP, UDP Routers, nlb L4 2 Internet IPv4, IPv6, ICMP, IPSEC Switches L3 1 Link Physical medium Cables L2 OSI Open Systems Interconnection Model Why? Useful for defining standards so computers from different manufacturers could “talk” to each other. Layer Name Function Devices 7 Application HTTP, FTP, SMB, SMTP, DHCP etc.
